name: Street Football Show
description:
Soccer, street light and naughty boy, what will you think of when you see those words? Does it remind you the days that you are young? Can you imagine that a naughty boy focus playing a soccer under the street lights? This boy is so much focusing on playing football, so that him forget the time goes by. All kind of cool actions, ball jump, fly and rotate under the control of his feet, it seems the ball is a part of the body. And finally show a beautiful balcony shot. And a moment later, someone comes out from the buildings and shout ...
All that are this game provides for you. Cool with ball action show (street style) and balcony shot. Of course nobody will blame you when you give a balcony shot in the game. Play the ball always as your wish here. So guys, please go and give it a try!

How to play:
- balcony shot: click the ball and slide to balcony on the screen to kick out football
- street style: operate differently to different with ball actions
